Posts.Title: Starting TCH/Perjeta in January 2014 beachgirl501 beachgirl501

Posts.Content: mokenagirl wrote: Hi, I just got the news last Tuesday, that it has reared its ugly head in my liver. Tomorrow,I will have my biopsy  (a Christmas I will never forget)  . Does it hurt? Will I be able to travel to my brother's house about 45 minutes away? Then my doc goes on vacation for a week, then I assume I will start treatment first week in Jan. He is putting me on Taxel, Hercupten, Perjeta, and a few other chemos (I forgot what). If anyone reading this has been on these chemos how long where you on it? Did you get sick? I am the main providere in my family, will I be well enough work ? I am very concerened about making the mortage (I should of left him years ago). I keep thinking I will me homeless, sick, and bald. Anything you can share I appreciate. Oh, I just found out I need further testing for glaucoma. I can add blind to my list of worries.   When it rains-it poors Thanks, Barb Dx 3/2010, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 1/11 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I am back in the club. mokenagirl Fitztwins

Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2014 04:10PM mokenagirl wrote: Well, I will be having my 12th(yes 12th) treatment of taxotere, perjeta, and hercipten. Last scan doc didn't know if it was scar tissue or tiny cancer cells. We will do a pet scan next. If it lights up, we all know what that means. I believe he plans on taking me off taxotere reguardless. I hope to lose the wig by Christmas.
